alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland; Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 3:30AM CDT until March 24 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Erath County in north central Texas... Eastland County in north central Texas... Central Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 329 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cross Cut, or 21 miles north of Early, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Comanche, Eastland, Cisco, Dublin, Ranger, De Leon, Gorman, Rising Star, Lake Leon, Huckabay, Lake Olden, Proctor Lake, Pleasant Hill, Carbon, Staff, Purves, Nimrod, Comyn and Kokomo. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 333 and 352, and between mile markers 363 and 368. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
